venue.address_1: Large parking lot S side of NH Route 11 about 2.2 miles E of Route 11-A
venue.name: Mt Major: Alton Bay, NH

item.description:
COME ONE COME ALL TO THE ANNUAL MT MAJOR HIKE.  START 2013 OFF ON THE RIGHT FOOT.

If there is only one event you can attend in 2013, this is it! 

 All attendees must read, understand and agree to the waiver/liability as outlined by this website. All hikers must have foot traction of some type.

We will be hiking up Mt. Major via the backside trail.  Upon reaching the Mount Major summit we can make a decision as a group on whether or not to take the Major/Straightback link over to Straightback mountain. This would add approximately an additional 3 miles round trip to the hike. Therefore total distance would be approximately 7 miles and should take approximately 5 hours to accomplish.
item.how_to_find_us: WE WILL BE IN A SILVER FOUR DOOR LEGACY SUBARU
item.name: ANNUAL NEW YEAR'S DAY MT MAJOR HIKE
